physical_examinations.vital_signs: Raised fasting cholesterol level of 9.5 mmol/L, LDL 6.25 mmol/L, HDL 0.73 mmol/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Operative scars over both mastoid regions; lower motor neuron seventh cranial nerve palsy on the right side; sensorineural deafness in the left ear and mixed hearing loss in the right; xanthomas present over both periorbital areas, Achilles tendons, and triceps tendons.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Cholesterol level decreased from 7.02 mmol/L to 5.86 mmol/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mass on the left side minimally increased in size (~0.5 cm); lesion remnants on the right side remained unchanged.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The mass on the left side increased in size after surgery, while the right side lesion remained unchanged.
